-----> No Poetry version specified in POETRY_VERSION config var. Defaulting to 1.6.1.
-----> Generate requirements.txt with Poetry
-----> Install Poetry
       >>> mocked curl call <<<
-----> Add Poetry to the PATH
-----> Export requirements.txt from Poetry
       >>> mocked poetry call <<<
-----> Export Python version from Poetry to Heroku runtime.txt file
-----> Read Python version from poetry.lock
-----> Found Python ~3.8 in poetry.lock, using Heroku's latest Python 3.8.16
-----> Write 3.8.16 into runtime.txt
